page.title: 11A FARMER'S DAUGHTER'S DAY
page.content: On a week day I have to be up at 7.00 to be ready for the school bus at 8.30.I feed my pets before dressing in school uniform.After breakfast my brother and I walk down the road to wait for the bus.School starts at 9.05 with registration;lessons stop at 12.10 for lunch then continues at 12.55 until 3.20 when school closes. We arrive home a little after 4.00.I usually have about 1.5 hours homework each night.Afterwards I watch television or listen to records (Iron Maiden are my favourite).As I live 5 miles out of Petersfield it's not easy to see my friends.I read and watch T.V a lot.Although I live on a farm it doesn't interest me very much though I do talk to the cows when I walk over Park Hill to East Meon.On Saturdays I have riding lessons.
